title: which android version has the best battery life? I just bought a new in box pixel 1.
content:
brand new pixel not a refurb or used. took plastic shrink wrap off. came with android 9.0 I am now upgraded to july patch. should I flash the phone with android 8.1 or earlier?

battery life is terrible I have little to nothing running. got battery saver on though before july update I was unable to turn on battery saver. got adaptive battery on. battery predicted life is off like crazy battery drains faster than it can keep on track.
